nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny. High near 97, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 106. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 7pm and 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 75. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
